subject: Football
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Easterling was part of the Atlanta Falcons’ Grits Blitz in the 1970s and later joined a high-profile lawsuit against the N.F.L. over its handling of concussion-related injuries.
snippet: Mr. Easterling was part of the Atlanta Falcons’ Grits Blitz in the 1970s and later joined a high-profile lawsuit against the N.F.L. over its handling of concussion-related injuries.
